text: 'Aurea' cultivar with greenish leaves and white flowers Lithops fulviceps is a species of plant in the family Aizoaceae. It is endemic to Namibia. Its natural habitats are rocky areas and cold desert. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== fulviceps Category:Endemic flora of Namibia Category:Least concern plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lithops fulviceps
